Reviews.Author: SANDRA
Reviews.Content: I reside in San Diego and whenever I visit Las Vegas I always look forward to eating from Taste De Tropics. Not only is the food delicious but the owner is very passionate about her food and satisfying her customers. My favorites are the oxtails, rice and peas and the dessert bread pudding. rum cake and the pineapple upside down cake. This is a must place to try. Taste de Tropics makes your mouth water.

Reviews.Author: Anastacia
Reviews.Content: My mouth is watering just thinking of the food and desserts. The rum cake is my favorite, doesn't mean I don't enjoy that bread pudding because I sure do. I  couldn't stop eating it. A must try. Check it out you won't be disappointed .

Reviews.Author: Dametria
Reviews.Content: Ok. So... I've never liked bread pudding, but someone told me I should try this one. She makes THE BEST bread pudding. It is a must have everytime I go to Vegas. Just thought everyone should know.
